Medium: 33 engravings, printed in black, and 42 wood engraved ornaments (cut by Paul Baudier), printed in color on ivory, smooth, wove Arches paper; supplementary suite of engravings with 3 additional plates not used in book on ivory, smooth, wove Auvergne Richard de Bas paper; and suite of ornaments with 1 additional plate not used in book on ivory, smooth, wove Malacca paper
Dimensions:
irreg. page  17 1/2 x 13 3/16" (44 x 33.5 cm)
Prints: various dimensions.
Title: LE SATYRICON
